alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clinton; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 5:21PM EDT until July 24 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Brown County in southwestern Ohio... South central Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Highland County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 521 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Lynchburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Lynchburg, New Vienna, Russell, Martinsville, Fayetteville, St. Martin, Chasetown and Lake Lorelei. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
